text: Tara balale -- ''he luta! Amara niscaya tomara prabhura duta. Tara kakhana'i tomara kache ghesate parabe na, sutaram tomara paribarabargasaha yatra karo ratera e'i praharera madhye, ara tomadera madhyera ke'u'i pechana phero na tomara stri byatita, kenana odera ya ghatabe tara'o ta'i ghatabe. Nihsandeha tadera nirdharita samaya hacche bhorabela. Bhorabela ki asanna naya?â€™â€™
